data.actual_result: The name overlaps the two lines that you're supposed to hold down to sort the category
data.expected_result: The name should be cut off with "..." as for regular channels
data.short_description: Categories with an excessively long name make them overlap the two lines in Category Sort Mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a server with Manage channels - Create a new category and give it a super long name - Go to Server settings > Channels - Tap on the button top right and select Category Sort Mode
